title: Fragrant lamb with spinach
ingredients: ['2 tbsp sunflower oil', '2 onions, finely chopped', '4 garlic cloves, crushed', '5 cm (2 in) piece fresh root ginger, peeled and chopped', '1 red chilli, seeded and sliced', '2 tsp paprika', '2 tsp ground cumin', '2 tsp ground coriander', '1 tsp ground white pepper', '½ tsp ground cinnamon', 'seeds from 8 green cardamom pods, crushed', '2 bay leaves', '½ tsp salt', '200 g (7 oz) Greek-style yogurt', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) lean boneless lamb, cubed', '2 large tomatoes, chopped', '225 g (8 oz) fresh baby spinach', '4 tbsp chopped fresh coriander', 'sprigs of fresh coriander to garnish']
